techmeme.title: TSMC's Taiwan-listed shares hit a new record high after its US-listed stock jumped 6.85% overnight, following a rally by shares of Nvidia, a major TSMC customer (Sherry Qin/Wall Street Journal)
Jonathan Kanter, the US DOJ's assistant AG for antitrust, says he is examining "monopoly choke points and the competitive landscape" in AI and microchips (Financial Times)
An analysis finds 90K+ images of popular anime characters on generative AI image sharing sites; ~2.5K images had multiple similarities to the original artwork (Nikkei Asia)
Sources: the US DOJ will take the lead in investigating whether Nvidia has violated antitrust laws; the FTC will lead the inquiries into OpenAI and Microsoft (David McCabe/New York Times)
The US FTC opens an antitrust probe of Microsoft's deal with Inflection AI that included hiring Mustafa Suleyman and paying $650M to resell Inflection's tech (Wall Street Journal)
